snippet: After an online petition collected thousands of signatures asking the magazine not to print photos that were retouched, the editors of Seventeen promised to “celebrate every kind of beauty.”
abstract: After an online petition collected thousands of signatures asking the magazine not to print photos that were retouched, the editors of Seventeen promised to “celebrate every kind of beauty.”

headline.main: Seventeen Magazine Vows to Show Girls 'as They Really Are'
headline.print_headline: A Magazine Vows to Ease Retouching
